channel.title: I can't install Window XP on the Whonix Virtual Box . Help Me !!
channel.description:
I can't install Window XP Pro SP3 32bit on the Whonix Workstation Virtual Box . I want to use Windows Apps safely , through the Whonix Gateway . But , I tried to install the Windows XP many times , One message appears every time , and installation hangs up every time ...
The message is
Setup is starting Windows
After this message , DVD drive stops , and installation hangs up ... I waited for 3 hours , But installation didn't run ..
So , I found this way , on the internet . https://pascalg.wordpress.com/2006/08/09/windowsxp-install-stalling-setup-is-starting-windows-but-it-never-started/
I tried this , but the bad situation didn't change ... So , Please HELP Me ... I want to use windows apps on the Whonix ...
My PC situation is ... Windows XP Pro SP3 32bit -> Virtual Box -> Whonix WS-> Virtual Box -> Windows XP Pro SP3 32bit
The Last Windows XP Pro can't install ... I don't know the reason ...
If there are who has great knowledge , Please HELP Me ...

item.title: I can't install Window XP on the Whonix Virtual Box . Help Me !!
item.dc:creator: David333
item.description:
I’ve noticed virtualbox can use IDE drive .
And used it to install XP .
But , the result was same …

Setup is starting Windows

After this message , XP installation hangs up …

And , I tried Windows 7 ,
But , the result was same …

Starting Windows …

After this message , 7 installation also hangs up …
I’ve waited for 10 hours , but didn’t start installation …

I’ve done everything , Then I thought , this is the virtual box’s problem .
I’ll ask virtualbox support or forum …

Thanks everyone on this board …
I appreciate you …

Read full topic
item.source: I can't install Window XP on the Whonix Virtual Box . Help Me !!

item.title: I can't install Window XP on the Whonix Virtual Box . Help Me !!
item.dc:creator: David333
item.description:
If using SATA drive to install Windows XP ,
The installation hangs up …

Virtual box can’t use IDE drive , I looked so .
So , I used SATA drive .
That was the reason …

I’ve learned the reason …

Read full topic
item.source: I can't install Window XP on the Whonix Virtual Box . Help Me !!

item.title: I can't install Window XP on the Whonix Virtual Box . Help Me !!
item.dc:creator: David333
item.description:
I found the reason .

This is it .
https://www.virtualbox.org/ticket/12417

I’ve learned Windows XP can’t boot from SATA CD/DVD drive .
Windows XP can boot from IDE drive .
My PC has IDE DVD/CD drive .
I’ve installed 1st HOST Windows XP to this PC by using the IDE drive .
But , virtual box cant use IDE drive …It looks SATA drive only OK …

I thought using virtual disc ISO on whonix to install XP …
If the way can’t do the thing , Then I’ll try Windows 7 …

Read full topic
item.source: I can't install Window XP on the Whonix Virtual Box . Help Me !!

item.title: I can't install Window XP on the Whonix Virtual Box . Help Me !!
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

David333:

Why XP installation hangs up ?? I don’t know …

That is hard to tell for us either, as this problem is in no way connected to Whonix. Maybe your source file/disk is corrupted…

David333:

Should I install Windows 7 ??

Yeah it is far safer and actually more efficient in regards to the way it uses the hardware available, as far as my experience goes.

Read full topic

item.title: I can't install Window XP on the Whonix Virtual Box . Help Me !!

item.description:
Should I install Windows 7 ??

I prefer XP still now …

I want to install XP …

item.title: I can't install Window XP on the Whonix Virtual Box . Help Me !!
item.dc:creator: David333
item.description:
My PC’s detail is
CPU PentiumD , memory 3GB , Graphic Gef750Ti

So , I think My PC can run windows XP on the Whonix virtualBox .

Windows XP is light OS , not heavy …
And Classic OS , easy to use , So I like this .

I want to install XP on Whonix WS Virtual Box …
I know Virtual Box can install Windows XP .
Why XP installation hangs up ?? I don’t know …

Read full topic
item.source: I can't install Window XP on the Whonix Virtual Box . Help Me !!

item.title: I can't install Window XP on the Whonix Virtual Box . Help Me !!
item.dc:creator: entr0py
item.description:
Really don’t understand the obsession with Windows XP. Are you still using a Pentium 4 cpu?

David333:

I want to use Windows Apps safely

You can’t on Windows XP.

From https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Windows_xp:

Extended support for Windows XP ended on April 8, 2014, after which the operating system ceased receiving further support or security updates to most users.

As the end of extended support approached, Microsoft began to increasingly urge XP customers to migrate to newer versions such as Windows 7 or 8 in the interest of security, suggesting that attackers could reverse engineer security patches for newer versions of Windows and use them to target equivalent vulnerabilities in XP.[124][125][126]

Windows XP is remotely exploitable by numerous security holes that were discovered after Microsoft stopped supporting Windows XP.[148][149][150]

You can’t expect to get support for a vulnerable OS from a forum dedicated to protecting privacy. (Anonymity and security are highly related.)

David333:

I want to use windows apps on the Whonix …

  • Use a supported version of Windows.
  • Follow this guide: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Other_Operating_Systems
  • Windows does not need to be nested inside Whonix-Workstation. All traffic is torrified by Whonix-Gateway.

Read full topic
item.source: I can't install Window XP on the Whonix Virtual Box . Help Me !!

item.title: I can't install Window XP on the Whonix Virtual Box . Help Me !!
item.dc:creator: David333
item.description:
I can’t install Window XP Pro SP3 32bit on the Whonix Workstation Virtual Box .
I want to use Windows Apps safely , through the Whonix Gateway .
But , I tried to install the Windows XP many times ,
One message appears every time , and installation hangs up every time …

The message is

Setup is starting Windows

After this message , DVD drive stops , and installation hangs up …
I waited for 3 hours , But installation didn’t run …

So , I found this way , on the internet .

Random thoughts ... – 9 Aug 06

WindowsXP install stalling – Setup is starting Windows … but it never started ;)

I was installing WindowsXP on a PC the other day. Everything was supposed to work fine and it did, for a start until the installation reached “Setup is starting Windows” where it just s…

I tried this , but the bad situation didn’t change …
So , Please HELP Me …
I want to use windows apps on the Whonix …

My PC situation is …
Windows XP Pro SP3 32bit -> Virtual Box -> Whonix WS-> Virtual Box -> Windows XP Pro SP3 32bit

The Last Windows XP Pro can’t install …
I don’t know the reason …

If there are who has great knowledge , Please HELP Me …
